channel.title: productivity on Pitch by Shun Kakinoki
channel.description: Recent content in productivity on Pitch by Shun Kakinoki

item.title: Youtube Collaborating on Autopilot
item.description: Youtube Collaborating on Autopilot Mission All-in-one solution to maximize your creativity on the world’s largest platform Problem Youtube collaborating is rather hard There is no one-stop solution for video-editing based team work tool Data & Analytics specialized towards specific Youtubers Solution One-stop platform for all creators to maximize productivity Realize the world where people can establish play as work Enterprise sponsor bidding also included within the platform
item.content:encoded: Youtube Collaborating on Autopilot Mission All-in-one solution to maximize your creativity on the world&rsquo;s largest platform Problem Youtube collaborating is rather hard There is no one-stop solution for video-editing based team work tool Data &amp; Analytics specialized towards specific Youtubers Solution One-stop platform for all creators to maximize productivity Realize the world where people can establish play as work Enterprise sponsor bidding also included within the platform

item.title: LifeOps Community Platform
item.description: LifeOps Community Platform Mission Empower and promote lifeops with the help of the community Problem Lifeops can be challenging when working alone Custom platform to avoid notification bombardment Messages can be discouraging and plain in lifeops community Solution Custom platform to solely promote lifeops Platform-agnostic efficient system with engaging analytics Relevant analytics for competition and communication
item.content:encoded: LifeOps Community Platform Mission Empower and promote lifeops with the help of the community Problem Lifeops can be challenging when working alone Custom platform to avoid notification bombardment Messages can be discouraging and plain in lifeops community Solution Custom platform to solely promote lifeops Platform-agnostic efficient system with engaging analytics Relevant analytics for competition and communication
